page.title: 15THE CHURCH NEWTON ST.CYRES
page.content: The vicar is in charge of{five {other parishes.}He holds two morning services every Sunday at ST.CYR & ST.JULETTA, Newton St. Cyres.The {average number of people at the {service is 55 to 60. This year the{FLOWER FESTIVAL}(held biennially)was particularly{beautiful. The school childern entered a "dish display"of{wild flowers,}being careful to be aware of the need for the {conservation of rare species. { The Patronal Festival}is organised annually on the Sunday nearest to Mid- Summer. Concerts, meetings,baptisms etc. take place. The vicar visits villagers to encourage them to attend church.The{bells are rung on Sunday and the bellringers practise on Tuesday.{They would like to ring more {often. { The clock is being refurbished now.
